long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e: Browser plugin for Vaani Tamil Spell checker. Vaani is an award winning online Spell checker in Tamil. This Extension will allow users to do proof read directly on Tamil content from the web pages. User can get suggestion while typing in textbox or textarea. It works well with blogger, wordpress, facebook, twitter, wikipedia and most of the simple web apps. User can customize the suggestion and preferences.
long.en: Browser plugin for Vaani Tamil Spell checker.
